## <img style="display: inline;" alt="Embedded Image" src="data:image/png;base64," /> I've had my 100th blogpost! <img style="display: inline;" alt="Embedded Image" src="data:image/png;base64," />

And i still like it to write these little (link: http://der-zyklop.de/blog/tags/tag:code text: tutorials about git, sublime & co.) and posts about (link: http://der-zyklop.de/blog/tags/tag:opensource text: open source) and (link: http://der-zyklop.de/blog/tags/tag:design text: design) and articles (link: http://der-zyklop.de/blog/tags/tag:weltretten text: about dumbasses that are spying on me) and (link: http://der-zyklop.de/blog/tags/tag:digitalisierung text: the future) and everyday life and (link: http://der-zyklop.de/blog/tags/tag:politik text: german politics) and (link: http://der-zyklop.de/blog/tags/ text: all that stuff).

BTW:  Did you know, that you can use Emoji's (these smilies and cute puppies and so on) in almost every application on your Mac? Its build in your operating system! Just type `ctrl` + `⌘` + `space`. 

Nice, ha?! <img style="display: inline;" alt="Embedded Image" src="data:image/png;base64," />
